body.name: IVANKY Optical Audio Cable 6ft/1.8M, Nylon Braided, 24K Gold-Plated, Slim Metal Case, CL3 Rated, S/PDIF Toslink Digital Audio Fiber Optic Cable for Home Theater, Sound Bar, TV, PS4, Xbox, Samsung
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 44 mins
features: 【Home Theater Experience】iVANKY digital optical audio cable allows you to connect soundbars and home theatres to TVs/PS4/Xbox/Blu-Ray Players and more devices with standard Toslink (s/PDIF, optical, optic) ports, Outperform than your previous optical audio cable. The right fiber optic cable for crystal and clear sound

【Top-Notch Fiber Core】iVANKY digital optical audio cable adopts fiber cores from TORAY, Japan for zero distortion digital audio stream. Compatible with uncompressed PCM audio and compressed 5.1 to 7.1 surround sound systems including Dolby Digital Plus, DTS-HD High Resolution and LPCM, delivering stunning sound with wide dynamic range to your living room

【Upgrade 24K Gold-Plated Connectors】This extra flexible fabric braided nylon optic cable for soundbar is much more durable than plastic cable. Aluminum alloy shell for better heat dissipation and corrosion-resistant.The connector is 24K gold plated which greatly ensures stable signal transmission and improves the durability, corrosion resistance, mechanical behavior and electrical properties of the connector

【Secure & Snug Connection】Precisely designed cuboid connectors make this digital audio optical cable easier to identify the installation angle and fits standard Toslink (s/PDIF, Optical) port snugly. Removable rubber caps can prevent dust and oxidation when not plugged in
【Extended Warranty】You’ll get a 24K digital optical audio cable, an 18+36-month worry-free warranty and our friendly support team ready to help within 24h

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and effective
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to connect my tv to an older receiver. It works like a charm. Great quality and sound is good. Can't beat it for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long and Durable
reviews.reviewText: works great for my tv and soundbar and it’s very high quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars solidly built; excellent sound quality
reviews.reviewText: Purchased to replace an optical cable that came with a mid-tier surround sound system - why a manufacturer would include such a poor quality cable which inherently makes their product perform poorly is beyond me, but it is not uncommon. Anyway this cable is well made, thick, robust, excellent plugs with tethered protectors - and excellent sound quality at a good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A High-Quality Optical Audio Cable for Enhanced Audio Experience - A Four-Star Amazon Review
reviews.reviewText: The IVANKY Optical Audio Cable has proven to be a reliable and well-performing addition to my audio setup, enhancing my listening experience significantly. This 10ft/3M slim braided fiber audio cable has impressed me with its sturdy build, crisp audio transmission, and hassle-free usage, earning it a solid four-star rating.The standout feature of this cable is its slim and braided design, which not only adds durability but also prevents tangling and kinks. The braided fiber sheath adds a touch of elegance to the cable, making it not only practical but visually appealing as well. The slim profile ensures that it fits effortlessly into tight spaces, adding to the cable's convenience.The audio transmission quality is exceptional, delivering clear and rich sound without any interference or signal loss. I noticed a significant improvement in audio fidelity when using this optical audio cable compared to standard audio cables. The cable's ability to transmit high-resolution audio signals flawlessly makes it ideal for connecting my home theater system or soundbar to my TV, ensuring an immersive audio experience.The gold-plated connectors offer a secure and reliable connection, preventing corrosion and maintaining optimal signal transfer. This is particularly crucial for uninterrupted audio playback, and the IVANKY cable does an excellent job in this regard.I appreciate the 10ft/3M length of the cable, which provides ample flexibility in positioning my audio devices without the need for extension cords. The length allows me to set up my audio system without constraints, ensuring a clutter-free and organized entertainment area.The cable is compatible with various devices and supports both standard and high-definition audio formats, making it versatile for a wide range of audio setups.The only reason I'm not awarding a full five stars is due to the occasional difficulty in inserting and removing the cable from certain devices. The connectors could have been designed with a more user-friendly grip or labeled for easier identification when connecting multiple cables in a tight space.In conclusion, the IVANKY Optical Audio Cable offers exceptional performance, aesthetics, and durability. Its slim and braided design ensures a tangle-free experience, while the crisp audio transmission enhances the overall listening pleasure. The gold-plated connectors and 10ft/3M length provide reliability and versatility, making it a valuable addition to any audio setup.Despite a minor inconvenience with connector handling, the IVANKY Optical Audio Cable has exceeded my expectations and significantly improved my audio setup. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a high-quality optical audio cable for their home entertainment system or audio devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not sure if it's the cable
reviews.reviewText: I'm hearing static while using this cord, not sure if it's the cable or my surround sound, using HDMI there is no static, using bluetooth and wifi there is static, using this cord there is FAINT static but it's enough to be distracting. I'm just not positive that it's this cord because the surround sound is some off brand wackadoodle from deepest darkest China. It came with a fiber cord but despite looking similar it absolutely will not fit in anything so I can't test it. It looks the same in all aspects, but won't fit.So I'll leave the review at 5 stars unless I can figure out if it's this cord or not.It looks well made and all, not cheap or nothin'. But looks can be deceiving.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No issues. I’m sure the gold-plated contacts are a gimmick, since I replaced Amazon Basics version with this and don’t notice a difference.Just wished I received an unopened box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ivanky Digital Optical Audio Cable
reviews.reviewText: This cable worked out better than I expected. The nylon material was strong and flexible and was easy to conceal behind my equipment. The sleek design kept the area behind my device clear from clutter or bulkiness making it roomy enough that the other cable were not crammed to tightly together. This cable was a great value for the quality of the design. I would recommend this product to others.
